thread.title: New York plans to blow up 77-year-old Kosciuszko Bridge
thread.title_full: New York plans to blow up 77-year-old Kosciuszko Bridge

author: GLENN BLAIN
title: New York plans to blow up 77-year-old Kosciuszko Bridge
text:
18 PM 
ALBANY â€” The Kosciuszko Bridge is going out with a bang. 
State officials announced plans on Wednesday to collapse the approaches to the 77-year-old span sometime this summer as work progresses on the two new bridges that will replace it. 
"New York is recapturing the bold ambition that made this the Empire State in the first place, and accelerating construction of the new Kosciuszko Bridge is the latest example of how we are growing and innovating," Gov. Cuomo said. 
An exact date for blowing up the approaches has not been set, administration officials said. 
Cross Bronx Expressway named most congested city roadway in U.S. 
The implosion of the approaches is part of a $555 million project to remove the aging bridge and build the first of the two new spans that will carry the Brooklyn-Queens Expressway. 
The decaying main span will be dropped down separately before the approaches explode to avoid dropping materials into Newtown Creek. Cuomo said traffic will switch from the old bridge to the first of the two new bridges in early Spring 2017. That span will carry three lanes of traffic in each direction. (Farriella, Christie M,, Freelanc) 
Cuomo said traffic will switch from the old bridge to the first of the two new bridges in early Spring 2017. That span will carry three lanes of traffic in each direction. 
Once the existing bridge is removed, the second bridge, intended for Brooklyn-bound traffic, will be constructed in its place. State officials have not released a cost estimate for the second bridge. 
Port Authority eyeing harness-equipped cops on GWB 
Cuomo said the second bridge is projected to open in early 2020, about 4 years ahead of the initial schedule. 
When both spans are completed, the Queens-bound bridge will carry five lanes of traffic and the Brooklyn-bound bridge will carry four lanes, as well as a bikeway/walkway. Tags:
